summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a potential call with the chairman of Sal Oppenheim. The email indicates that Epstein is seeking to arrange a conversation and includes a note about the confidentiality of the communication.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as a recipient of an email from Jeffrey Epstein, discussing a potential call.

persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, seeking to arrange a call with Jes Staley regarding the chairman of Sal Oppenheim.

keyFacts: The email was sent on August 10, 2009.
Jeffrey Epstein is attempting to arrange a call with Jes Staley regarding the chairman of Sal Oppenheim.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
